abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile talks about
            improving living conditions for internally displaced people
            in Azerbaijan. Seven percent of Azerbaijan’s population,
            approximately 6 million people, was displaced,
            proportionally one of the highest concentrations of
            Internally Displaced Persons (IDPs) in the world. Azerbaijan
            IDP Economic Development Support Project has funded three
            hundred and nineteen small scale service and infrastructure
            micro-projects, identified by communities of internally
            displaced people as their greatest development needs. Micro
            projects included school, housing and road rehabilitation,
            upgrade of water and electricity supplies, and the provision
            of community facilities.
